mapper.select: SELECT a.name AS 'memberName', a.integral AS 'availablePoints', c.group_name AS 'enterpriseName', c.logo_url AS 'enterpriseLogoURL', b.app_head_image_url AS 'memberHeadImgURL', b.auth_flag AS 'authFlag' FROM ad_user a LEFT JOIN ad_user_personal_info b ON a.id = b.id LEFT JOIN ad_group c ON a.group_num = c.id WHERE a.id = #{userId} AND a.del_flag = 0

SELECT a.name AS 'memberName', a.integral AS 'availablePoints', c.group_name AS 'enterpriseName', c.logo_url AS 'enterpriseLogoURL', b.app_head_image_url AS 'memberHeadImgURL', b.auth_flag AS 'authFlag', d.f1 AS 'noviceGuideFinished', d.f2 AS 'integralGuideFinished', d.f15 AS 'appIndexPrivilege' FROM ad_user a LEFT JOIN ad_user_personal_info b ON a.id = b.id LEFT JOIN ad_group c ON a.group_num = c.id LEFT JOIN ad_user_business_expansion d ON a.id = d.user_id AND d.business_type = 'app-guide' AND d.del_flag = 0 WHERE a.id = #{userId} AND a.del_flag = 0
SELECT COUNT(id) AS 'thriftTotal', SUM(total_price) - SUM(total_mount) AS 'thriftAmount' FROM ad_order_report WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND `type` = 1 AND state =1 AND del_flag = 0;

SELECT cc.coupon AS "couponId", DATEDIFF(cac.end_date, NOW()) AS 'expiredDays' FROM ad_coupon_activity_conn cac LEFT JOIN ad_coupon c ON cac.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ad_coupon_code cc ON cc.coupon = c.id AND cac.activity_id = cc.activity_id INNER JOIN ad_user u ON u.id = cc.user_id INNER JOIN ad_group_activity_conn gac ON u.group_num = gac.group_id AND gac.activity_id = cac.activity_id WHERE cc.user_id = #{userId} AND cc.is_used = 0 AND cc.del_flag = 0 AND c.del_flag = 0 AND u.del_flag = 0 AND cac.begin_date <= NOW() AND NOW() <= cac.end_date ORDER BY cc.receive_date DESC

SELECT gac.id AS 'id', gac.activity_id AS 'activityId', gac.coupon_id AS 'couponId', gac.group_id AS 'groupId', gac.user_type AS 'userType', gac.create_user AS 'createUser', gac.create_date AS 'createDate', gac.other_activity_id AS 'otherActivityId' FROM ad_group_activity_conn gac LEFT JOIN ad_user u ON gac.group_id = u.group_num WHERE gac.activity_id = #{exclusiveCouponActivityId} AND u.id = #{userId} AND u.del_flag = 0

SELECT cac.id AS 'cacId', cac.coupon_remind_quantity AS 'couponRemindQuantity', ca.id AS 'activityId', c.id AS 'couponId', ca.name AS 'activityName', c.name AS 'couponName', c.coupon_unit AS 'couponUnit', c.coupon_value AS 'couponAmount', ca.begin_date AS 'activityBeginDate', ca.end_date AS 'activityEndDate', c.begin_date AS 'couponBeginDate', c.end_date AS 'couponEndDate', ca.list_image_url AS 'activityListImageUrl', ca.detail_image_url AS 'activityDetailImageUrl', ca.introduction AS 'activityIntroduction', ca.activity_link_url AS 'activityLinkUrl', c.product_id AS 'productId', c.product_name AS 'productName', c.business_id AS 'businessId', c.business_name AS 'businessName' FROM ad_coupon_activity_conn cac LEFT JOIN ad_coupon_activity ca ON cac.activity_id = ca.id LEFT JOIN ad_coupon c ON cac.coupon_id = c.id WHERE cac.activity_id = #{exclusiveCouponActivityId} AND cac.begin_date <= NOW() AND NOW() <= cac.end_date AND ca.activity_type = #{exclusiveCouponCode} AND ca.delete_flag = 0 AND c.del_flag = 0 AND c.is_open = 1

SELECT id AS 'id', user_id AS 'userId', business_type AS 'businessType', f1 AS 'noviceGuideFinished', f2 AS 'integralGuideFinished' FROM ad_user_business_expansion WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND business_type = #{businessType} AND del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ad_user_business_expansion ( user_id, business_type, f1, f2, create_date, del_flag) VALUE ( #{userId}, #{businessType}, #{noviceGuideFinished}, #{integralGuideFinished}, NOW(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, business_type, f1, f2, f15 FROM ad_user_business_expansion WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND business_type = 'app-guide' AND del_flag = 0
SELECT id AS 'groupId', IFNULL(app_start_up_url, '') AS 'appStartUpUrl', IFNULL(app_start_up_verions, '') AS 'appStartUpVerions' FROM ad_group WHERE id = #{groupId} AND del_flag = 0
